name: Exploring The Shoulder 3D CD
descr: This is the perfect learning tool for anyone who wants to learn about the basic anatomy, movement, injuries, and disorders of the shoulder. Vivid 3D computer-generated images clearly illustrate the features of each structure. The easy-to-understand text links to corresponding subjects. Features include rotating and still 3D models, mouse-over labeling, interactive quissing, and a gallery of images to print and use in presentations Topics, include: anatomy of the shoulder, AC joint hyperthrophy and seperation, acromial spurring, bankart lesion, bursitis, dislocation, Hill-Sachs lesion, impingement syndrome, humeral fracture, rotation cuff strains and tears, tendinosis (tendonitis).
